tracks.title: Morning Miracle
tracks.description: Transform your life with a powerful morning routine that sets the tone for success.

unlockTasks.description: Wake up at 6:00 AM sharp, no snoozing allowed.

unlockTasks.title: Drink Water First
unlockTasks.description: Drink 16 oz of water immediately upon waking.
